mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_market_chatroom (chatroom_id, goods_id, buyer_id, seller_id) VALUES (#{chatroom_id}, #{goods_id}, #{buyer_id}, #{seller_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_market_chatroom WHERE buyer_id=#{buyer_id} AND seller_id=#{seller_id} AND goods_id=#{goods_id}

SELECT c.chatroom_id FROM t_market_chatroom c, t_market_message m WHERE c.chatroom_id = m.chatroom_id AND (buyer_id=#{id} OR seller_id=#{id}) GROUP BY c.chatroom_id ORDER BY MAX(message_senderTime) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_market_message (message_id, chatroom_id, message_contents, message_sender, message_receiver) VALUES (#{message_id}, #{chatroom_id}, #{message_contents}, #{message_sender}, #{message_receiver})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_market_message SET message_read = 'read' WHERE chatroom_id = #{chatroom_id} AND message_receiver = #{message_receiver} AND message_read = 'no_read'
